Class GameStateManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.game.GameStateManager
public class GameStateManager extends Object
Manages the current state of the game using the State design pattern. This class tracks whether the game is running, paused, or over, and handles transitions between these states.

The GameStateManager supports three states:

  • Running: The game is actively playing
  • Paused: The game is temporarily stopped
  • Game Over: The game has ended
See Also:
  • AnimationHandler
  • GameLoop

      public GameStateManager()

  • Method Details

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      true if the game is paused, false otherwise

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise

    • onGameStarted

      public void onGameStarted(GameLoop loop)
      Called when the game starts. Transitions to the running state and starts the game loop.
      Parameters:
      loop - the game loop to start

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause(GameLoop loop)
      Toggles between paused and running states. Has no effect if the game is over.
      Parameters:
      loop - the game loop to pause or resume

    • onGameOver

      public void onGameOver(GameLoop loop)
      Transitions the game to the game over state. Stops the game loop and marks the game as finished.
      Parameters:
      loop - the game loop to stop

    • transitionTo

      private void transitionTo(GameStateManager.GameState newState, GameLoop loop)
      Performs a state transition and triggers the new state's entry behavior.
      Parameters:
      newState - the state to transition to
      loop - the game loop affected by the transition

    • enterRunning

      void enterRunning(GameLoop loop, boolean restart)
      Enters the running state, optionally restarting the game.
      Parameters:
      loop - the game loop
      restart - true to restart from beginning, false to resume

      void enterPaused(GameLoop loop)

    • enterGameOver

      void enterGameOver(GameLoop loop)
